title: Mattel Wins Disney Toy Deal, Joining Elsa of ‘Frozen’ With Barbie
sub_head: Toy company wrests back rights to film characters from rival Hasbro; losing the contract was ‘a wake-up’ call for Mattel
body:
Cinderella, Elsa and their friends are moving back in with Barbie.
Mattel Inc. has won the license to produce toys based on Walt Disney Co. ’s princess lineup and from the recent blockbuster “Frozen” franchise, wresting the properties back from its rival Hasbro Inc., according to Mattel executives.
